description: An AI agent is deployed to predict equipment failures in a semiconductor fabrication plant.  The agent analyzes sensor data and historical maintenance records to optimize preventative maintenance schedules and minimize downtime. This is a normal operation scenario, with expected performance within defined parameters.
initial_goal: Minimize unplanned downtime in the wafer fabrication facility by accurately predicting equipment failures and optimizing maintenance schedules.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor Manufacturing (specifically, a 300mm wafer fabrication facility)
